Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of evading enemy's attack
- Damage reduction rate 70%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking*
- ATK 500%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every attack received*
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:down_r} (no more than -50%)
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK 50%{passiveImg:down_r} (no more than -500%)
*For every attack evaded*
- {passiveImg:forever}DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 200%)
*For 4 turns from the character's entry turn*
- Character's Super Attack will be sealed
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn*
- Ki +3 and ATK 500%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:once}ATK 500%{passiveImg:up_g} and performs a critical hit when
attacking with 12 or more Ki
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 20%{passiveImg:up_g} as the 3rd attacker
in a turn

Leader Skill.Name: An Actual Ace Up the Sleeve

7645.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK for 1 turn and 
causes supreme damage to enemy
